MS MCQs

    Harness business intelligence with Microsoft 365 analytics and reporting

    »

    1. What is MyAnalytics?

      The ability automatically sort your email

      Analytics about your work patterns delivered as an email

      The ability to run AI modules in Azure


    2. Where can reports about SharePoint activity and usage be found?

      SharePoint Admin Center

      Configuration Manager

      Intune Admin Center


    3. In which ways can the Microsoft 365 admin center home page be customized?

      You cannot customize the Microsoft 365 admin center home page.

      Add cards to suit your needs.

      Use the Microsoft 365 compliance center.


    4. What is the main benefit of Workplace Analytics?

      It helps the organization to understand how groups collaborate.

      It reduces costs by only charging for storage that you really need.

      It reducing the time required to write reports in Word.
